titles.title: Veterans PARC Act of 2017

To amend title 38, United States Code, to authorize the Secretary of Veterans Affairs to transport an individual employed at a medical facility of the Department of Veterans Affairs between a parking facility and the medical facility.
Veterans PARC Act of 2017
Veterans Priority Access to Reliable Care Act of 2017

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Health.

term.name: Government employee pay, benefits, personnel management

bill.summary:
Veterans Priority Access to Reliable Care Act of 2017 or the Veterans PARC Act of 2017
This bill authorizes the Department of Veterans Affairs (VA) to use a passenger carrier to transport an individual employed at a VA medical facility between a parking facility and the medical facility.
